Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E]How I love my Ch[A]urch [F#m]I have shed my [E/G#]very blood to s[B]ave her [E]I do love my Ch[A]urch [F#m]I will never [E/G#]leave her nor fors[B]ake her I will be [C#m]with you in the darkest night your s[A]oul will ever face I will sust[C#m]ain you through your death and bring you s[A]afely to my h[B]eavenly pl[E]ace
Verse 2: [E]I will win my Ch[A]urch [F#m]I am calling [E/G#]her from every [A]tongue and tr[B]ibe [E]I will win my Ch[A]urch [F#m]For I’ve chosen [E/G#]her to be my s[A]potless br[B]ide My [C#m]robe of righteousness will cover [A]all of your disgrace And [C#m]every sin will disappear and s[A]ink into my s[B]ea of gr[E]ace
{new_page}
Verse 3: [E]I will build my Ch[A]urch [F#m]And the gates of [E/G#]hell won’t stand bef[A]ore h[B]er [E]I will build my Ch[A]urch For [F#m]who can def[E/G#]eat her if [A]I am f[B]or her [C#m]Do not be afraid for every tr[A]ial you endure [C#m]I will work for good and make it s[A]erve only to m[B]ake you p[E]ure
Verse 4: [E]And since I love you, my Ch[A]urch, [F#m]I command you [E/G#]also, l[A]ove each [B]other [E]And as I forgave you, Ch[A]urch, [F#m]I want you to [E/G#]also forg[A]ive each o[B]ther As [C#m]I have freely given you, so y[A]ou must freely give And [C#m]if you love like I’ve loved you, m[A]any blind will s[B]ee I L[E]IVE!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 how i love my church i have shed my very blood to save her i do love my church i will never leave her nor forsake her i will be with you in the darkest night your soul will ever face i will sustain you through your death and bring you safely to my heavenly place verse 2 i will win my church i am calling her from every tongue and tribe i will win my church for ive chosen her to be my spotless bride my robe of righteousness will cover all of your disgrace and every sin will disappear and sink into my sea of grace verse 3 i will build my church and the gates of hell wont stand before her i will build my church for who can defeat her if i am for her do not be afraid for every trial you endure i will work for good and make it serve only to make you pure verse 4 and since i love you my church i command you also love each other and as i forgave you church i want you to also forgive each other as i have freely given you so you must freely give and if you love like ive loved you many blind will see i live
